remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始化 RSA 对象在使用已生成的 XML 字符串中使用密钥信息方法。The initializes an RSA object using key information in an XML string that was generated using the method. 方法接受包含公钥的 XML 字符串或包含公钥和私钥的密钥的 XML 字符串。The method accepts either an XML string containing a public key or an XML string containing a public and private key. 使用方法可方便地初始化密钥信息。Use the method to conveniently initialize key information. > [!CAUTION] > 保留包含私钥到不安全的位置的 XML 字符串是一个安全威胁。Persisting an XML string containing a private key to an insecure location is a security threat. 如果恶意的第三方可以访问你的私钥，则可能会泄漏你的应用程序的安全性。The security of your application can be compromised if a malicious third party can access your private key. 若要安全地保存私钥，请使用安全的密钥容器。To safely persist a private key, use a secure key container. 有关将私钥存放在密钥容器的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 存储非对称密钥存储在密钥容器](~/docs/standard/security/how-to-store-asymmetric-keys-in-a-key-container.md)。For more information about persisting private keys in a key container, see [How to: Store Asymmetric Keys in a Key Container](~/docs/standard/security/how-to-store-asymmetric-keys-in-a-key-container.md).
